title: BREAKING: Curfew from 8 PM tonight (16) to 5 AM on Tuesday (17)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Nation-wide Curfew will be imposed from 8 PM on Monday (16) to 5 AM on Tuesday (17), said the President’s Media Division.
